report.title: Unallocated Squares
report.description: A list of users who have not been allocated a square yet ordered by the date they registered
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM users u JOIN users_websites uw on u.id=uw.user_id LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN people p on p.id = u.person_id LEFT JOIN locations sq ON pav.int_value=sq.id AND sq.deleted=false AND sq.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_square_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) WHERE u.deleted=false AND p.deleted=false AND sq.id IS NULL AND #website_filter#

param.name: user_square_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: ignore_registration_dates_before
param.description: Ignore anyone who registered earlier than this date. Useful if old users are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any sqaures created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.
